#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
 
int main()
{
        int t, len, i, len2;
        char s[51];
        scanf("%d", &t);
        while (t--)
        {
                scanf("%s", s);
                len = strlen(s);
                len2 = len >> 1;
                for (i = len2 - 1; i >= 0; i--)
                        printf("%c", s[i]);
                for (i = len - 1; i >= len2; i--)
                        printf("%c", s[i]);
                printf("\n");
        }
        return 0;
}
